controller

Class SAINController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SAINController

  • public class SAINController
extends java.lang.Object
    The sole controller class for the SAIN Report application. Handles and validates input from classes in the view package, and adds or retrieves data from classes in the report and user packages as necessary.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SAINController(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)

        public void setModelListeners()

      • generateId

        public int generateId(boolean student)
        Generates an ID of the lowest possible unused value. Value is dependant on the type of User
        Parameters:
        student - Whether or not a student ID is desired
        Returns:
        A new, unused, valid ID number of the desired type
